definition.name: First Interaction
definition.description: Greet first-time contributors when they open an issue or PR
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: issue_message
inputs.description: Comment to post on an individual's first issue

inputs.name: pr_message
inputs.description: Comment to post on an individual's first pull request

inputs.name: repo_token
inputs.description: Token with permissions to post issue and PR comments
